featured.text: In the chicken house, there were four old chickens, waiting to be killed (28) Sunday’s dinner.

definition.zh_def: 雞，一種常見的家禽，通常用於食用或產卵。
definition.en_def: A domesticated bird raised for its meat and eggs.
definition.example: I made a delicious chicken stew for dinner.
